verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> lovers of <S%G5367>self,<s%> lovers of <S%G5366>money,<s%> <S%G213>boastful,<s%> <S%G5244>arrogant,<s%> <S%G989>blasphemers,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G884>unthankful,<s%> <S%G462>unholy,<s%>
without natural <S%G794>affection,<s%> <S%G786>unforgiving,<s%> <S%G1228>slanderers,<s%> without <S%G193>self-control,<s%> <S%G434>fierce,<s%> no lovers of <S%G865>good,<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> people who <S%G1744>creep<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3614>houses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> take <S%G162>captive<s%> gullible <S%G1133>women<s%> <S%G4987>loaded<s%> down with <S%G266>sins,<s%> led <S%G71>away<s%> by <S%G4164>various<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> they will <S%G4298>proceed<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4119>further.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G454>folly<s%> will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1552>evident<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5613>men,<s%> as <S%G1565>theirs<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> came to <S%G1096>be.<s%>

<S%G1375>persecutions,<s%> and <S%G3804>sufferings:<s%> those things <S%G3634>that<s%> <S%G1096>happened<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> <S%G1722>and<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra.<s%> I <S%G5297>endured<s%> <S%G3634>those<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> Out <S%G1537>of<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4771>you<s%> <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3129>learned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have been assured <S%G4104>of,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> you have learned <S%G3129>them.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3754><s%> <S%G575>From<s%> <S%G1025>infancy,<s%> you have <S%G1492>known<s%> the <S%G2413>holy<s%> <S%G1121>Scriptures<s%> which are <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4679>make<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G4679>wise<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
